SEARCH

Package bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.util

package bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.util
The util package provides utility classes and interfaces that are used across the application. These utilities include logging functionality and password encryption.

Interfaces: Logger

Classes: LoggerImpl
PasswordEncryptor

These interfaces and classes are responsible for providing utility functions for the application. They provide methods for logging and password encryption.

See Also:
  • Logger
  • LoggerImpl
  • PasswordEncryptor

    Package
    Description
    bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server
    The server package contains the main entry point of the server side of the application.
    bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.command
    The command package contains classes and interfaces that define and implement the command pattern used in the application.
    bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.exception
    The exception package contains custom exception classes for the application.
    bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.model
    The model package contains classes and records that represent the main entities in the dealership system.
    bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.repository
    The repository package provides the data access layer for the application.
    bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.dealership.server.service
    The service package provides the business logic for the application.
  • Class
    Description
    Logger
    The Logger interface provides methods for logging messages.
    LoggerImpl
    The LoggerImpl class is an implementation of the Logger interface.

    The PasswordEncryptor class provides a method for encrypting passwords.
